profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
OGC - Ottawa General Contractors are leaders as Ottawa's design and build renovation experts. Specializing in home renovations, new and custom home construction as well as home design. With our project management and coordination, we're able to efficiently juggle more jobs, large and small, without dropping the ball. 

Ottawa General Contractors are an accredited business with the Ottawa BBB and our CEO, Moe Abbas is a former member of the board of directors for the Better Business Bureau (BBB).. Our skills and expert service has allowed us to expand to other cities in Canada including Vancouver and Calgary in less than 8 years making us one of the fastest growing construction companies. 

We offer warranty following the Tarion warranty guidelines for all our renovations and construction projects. We also have a design center and in house designers available to help you design and build your home. With over 50 years of experience, our team has the knowledge, the tools, the skill-set and the resources to give you the best value for your dollar at unbeatable service. 

We at Ottawa General Contractors understand that you are looking for value with your renovation services. Trust our team to do it right the first time! Call us directly at (613) 225-9991!

Visit our website for all our credentials and more information.

profile:
My name is Abe, owner at Arama Renos. I've worked as a construction worker with a construction company in Toronto for a few years, it was exciting and helped me establish a clear vision of where I was headed. I then took an amazing job as a warranty Technician with a local builder in Ottawa for some time, then 2019 came and I thought it was time to start my own Home Reno business which was my dream. We opened our doors in 2019 and it has been amazing ever since. We pride ourselves in what we do, our vision is to provide quality work combined with a strong customer service experience, we care about our customers and want to build a long-term relationship with them, a happy homeowner is what keeps us going!

At Arama Renos, we don't rush the work, we make sure to do it right and never cut corners".

profile:
Magnolia Construction prides itself on the ability to listen and anticipate wants and needs. That’s what makes us exceptional at customizing our services to the unique situation of each and every client. We guide your vision through the entire renovation process and ensure that we are on the same page as to the best way to achieve it.

Our team of designers and builders brings expertise in a wide variety of aspects in home remodelling, and our track record of customer satisfaction earns us repeat business and referrals. You’ll find us as attentive and courteous in customer service as in the remodelling work itself.

We’ve transformed many a kitchen in Ottawa, with renovations ranging from islands and new counter tops to knocking down walls and changing the entire dynamic to a more contemporary space. Our extensive experience in kitchen renovations means you’re getting highly skilled craftsmanship to execute an exquisite transformation. Our clients give us rave reviews and have great things to say about the renovations we’ve done for the kitchens and other living spaces.

Our bathroom renovations deliver quality results, on time and on budget. We’ll work with you to create an upgraded bathroom that makes you want to linger for a while, light a candle and relax. We’ve remodeled countless bathrooms in Ottawa homes, from counters and sinks to showers & tubs to tile floors. We leave no stone unturned when we executive a renovation, keeping your full satisfaction in mind at every measurement, cut and fitting.

Magnolia will transform your basement from “blah” to “wow.” We’ll work with you to design and deliver a functional, livable basement space that your family (or your tenant) will truly enjoy. We have a knack for translating visions into reality. Talk to Magnolia about how we can work together to build a dream basement. When it comes to basements there’s no need to aim low. You deserve the best quality renovation. Magnolia can make that happen.
services: Bathroom renovations, kitchen renovations, basement renovations, additions, general contracting, landscaping, decks
name: Magnolia Construction

They provide a variety of residential and commercial construction services, including custom cabinetry, custom stains, bathroom renovations, kitchen renovations and bathroom finishing. profile:
Brako bathroom specialists is a small locally owned and operated company that specializes in residential bathroom renovations.

We do bathrooms throughout the process from start-to-finish from floor-to-ceiling.

 It can be a Partial or full bathroom renovation.

Our scope of work includes gutting the existing bathroom, plumbing and electrical services, carpentry, plastering, tiling and fixture installation.

As part of our bathroom renovation services, we perform tub to shower conversions, bathroom enlargements and bathroom additions, Basement bathroom building/expansions.

Our proposals are in writing and contain descriptions of the work to be performed. 

We include the cost of rough materials, debris removal, and all labor costs. The homeowner purchases the finishing products, which they select from a retailer of their choice.   We do inform our customers how much to buy of each item and suggest retailers that have a good reputation for the product(s) being purchased.

Since we specialize in bathroom renovations, it is unlikely that costly surprises will be encountered once we start your project. We take pride in completing our work.

A quality Bathroom Renovation involves skills, craftsmanship, and materials that differ from Kitchens and other dry locations within a home.  
Just because someone can put up tile does not mean it will be done right for a bathroom.

Give us a call or send us an e-mail and I will arrange a convenient time to review your plans and discuss the various options available to achieve your expectations.
name: Brako Bathroom Specialist Inc.
